thread.section_title: ToursByLocals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ToursByLocals | www.toursbylocals.com
thread.title: Lisa & Chris Brennan
thread.title_full: ToursByLocals reviewed by Lisa & Chris Brennan

author: Lisa & Chris Brennan
title: Lisa & Chris Brennan
text:
Rasha made our first trip to Egypt a dream vacation. In November 2016, we visited Luxor and Cairo with her. We chose her based on the positive recommendations here and were very glad we did.
She is an excellent guide with extensive knowledge of Egypt. She is very nice and very professional--as are her drivers. Rasha made excellent recommendations for activities based on our interests. She helped us keep on our schedule, but also was flexible about our changes in plans.
We recommend her very highly.
